summary: scsi: target: tcmu: Avoid holding XArray lock when calling lock_page
details:
scsi: target: tcmu: Avoid holding XArray lock when calling lock_page

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit ff876b6cf5785e9604cd407022db917734b5d7ad, it was introduced in version v5.15.46 by commit 04be468ec13f4c9e4091c922c83ee920964e17df. For more details please see the references link.
